item.title: GOP urges Democrat governor to deploy National Guard to Charlotte as crime surges
item.description: Three North Carolina Republican lawmakers urge Democratic Gov. Josh Stein to deploy National Guard in Charlotte amid rising crime rates and homicides.

item.title: GOP lawmakers rally behind Trump's Venezuela strikes as critics question legality
item.description: The U.N. condemns Trump’s Venezuela strikes as violations of international law as U.S. lawmakers clash over sovereignty and global legal standards.
